mapper.insert: insert into goods (name, price, description, category_id) values( #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select id, name, price, description, review_count, discount_rate, reg_date from goods

select id, name, description, category_id,price, uuid, upload_path, file_name from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn, goods.id, goods.name, goods.description, goods.category_id, goods.price, attach.uuid, attach.upload_path, attach.file_name from goods goods join attach attach on goods.id = attach.goods_id join category category on goods.category_id = category.id , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP ) aa where rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and rn >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount};
mapper.sql: select goods.id, goods.name, goods.description, goods.category_id, goods.price, attach.uuid, attach.upload_path, attach.file_name from goods goods join attach attach on goods.id = attach.goods_id join category category on goods.category_id = category.id
